name: Basketball Sports Games 2k21
description:
Welcome to the brand new basketball sports game and play challenging matches with the opponents. The insanity of a basketball court is waiting for a player like you, who would shine up the court by their extreme skillful play.

Do practice and be ready to play the full court basketball game with rivals, they may be the game legends or some newbie trying to start. You will face both.



Use your skills and play by mind to become a dunking master on the court. You will be playing a complete player here. You will be doing the defense, attack and will be doing your best to put score on the point table.

Play devotedly, won the matches against the legends, and be the champion of the world.



Features:


- Feasible Game Controls.
- Practice mode play.
- PvP battle.
- Quick Matches.
- Championships battle.
- Upgrades and rewards.
- Eye Catchy graphics.
- Crowed cheering will feel you like you are in basketball court.
